This device sits at $180 in full without any discounts, which we saw drop down to this same all-time low rate back during Cyber Monday, where it’s been holding for the last two weeks with its $50 savings for this colorway, while other colorways have bounced around between $160 and $144. You can also find the lone 5-in-1 option in a green colorway down at $184.99 shipped from its $220 tag, as well as the roundup of other appliance deals from this brand led by the $280 CREAMi Scoop & Swirl ice cream maker.

items.title: This Christmas season offers up to 50% savings on roborock’s armada of robot cleaners, more at lows from $130
items.summary:
The official roborock Amazon storefront is offering up to 50% discounts across its armada of robot cleaners – plus, getting your orders in now guarantees they’ll arrive well over a week before Christmas. One notable standout is the roborock Q7 M5+ Robot Vacuum and Mop at $219.99 shipped. This is one of the brand’s latest models that comes starting at a far more budget-friendly $430 full price, and has been regularly dropping below $300 over 2025 for even more affordability – most recently hitting the $220 low for the first time during early Black Friday sales and continuing through Cyber Monday. Now, you can pick it up once more at the best price we have tracked, giving you 2-in-1 autonomous cleaning support with $210 savings. We’ve also collected a number of other robots benefitting from the best holiday discounts below.

items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Dyson is offering two of its multi-stylers at the best Amazon prices yet, with the Dyson Airwrap i.d. Multi-Styler for straight to wavy hair at $479 shipped, while the Dyson Airwrap i.d. Multi-Styler for complete diffusion of curly to coily hair is also down at $479 shipped. These two models normally go for $649 at full price, which we’ve been seeing cascade to lower and lower prices since early Black Friday sales – going as low as $499 until a few days ago when the price was cut to this same rate. You’re looking at $170 markdowns off their going rates here, beating out the discounts we’ve tracked up until now for new all-time low prices – and what’s best, you can still get orders in for pre-Christmas deliveries!

items.title: Get up to $562 savings on Velotric e-bikes + $100 gift card promotion for Christmas – deals start from $1,099
items.summary:
With its weekend flash sale now over, Velotric has switched gears and has launched its Christmas Gift Season Sale with select e-bike discounts of up to $400, free gifts, and even a free $100 gift card promotion when spending $2,500 or more. Among the small selection of deals, a standout is the newer Summit 1 Versatile Multi-Terrain e-bike in a Royal Blue colorway with $160 in FREE gear at $1,799 shipped, matching its Black Friday pricing. This e-bike alone would normally cost $1,999 at full price (and $2,059 with the bundled gear), which we only saw 2025 discounts to $1,899 until Black Friday/Cyber Monday, when this same low price came around for the second time since 2024. Now, you’re getting another chance to score the best tracked price, with $200 cut from the tag and a total $360 savings in all. Head below to learn more about it and the other offers during this Christmas sale.

items.title: The Parent Company Of Roomba Is Officially Bankrupt
items.summary:
iRobot Corp, the parent company of the popular Roomba robot vacuum, has filed for bankruptcy. Specifically, iRobot Corp’s IP will be handed over to PICEA, while the common […]
